title: Moment truck plunges off freeway in California
description: Dashcam footage has captured the moment a truck drove off the side of a highway in Rialto, California. The 36-year-old driver survived the crash and was transported to hospital.  #crash #truck #california

title: Police perform acrobatic stunts during Mexican parade
description: Police pulled off some acrobatic stunts on motorcycles during a Revolution Day Parade in Mexico. The country celebrated its 1910 revolution last month on November 20.

title: Alex Volkanovski to headline Sydney UFC event in February
description: Alex Volkanovski is the headline act for the UFC's return to Sydney in February. He'll defend his featherweight title in a rematch against Diego Lopes. #alexvolkanovski #diegolopes #ufc #mma #combatsports

title: Hit-and-run driver strikes multiple cars in Perth | 7NEWS
description: A hit-and-run driver in a Mazda struck multiple vehicles on Wypris Road in Camillo, Perth, before fleeing the scene. Nicole George, 47, was driving her Mitsubishi Outlander just metres from her home when she was hit by the ute, which then struck a parked Audi and damaged a fence before the driver abandoned the vehicle and escaped. Police are seeking information from witnesses as the investigation continues. title: First Nazi salute convictions under new WA laws | 7NEWS
description: Two men received fines after being sentenced under Western Australia's new Nazi salute laws in the first court cases testing the legislation. Daniel Stocks, 36, was fined $1,800 for performing five Heil Hitler salutes and making racist slurs in a Perth pub following an anti-immigration rally, while Samuel William Kroll, 21, received fines and a suspended sentence for racially harassing Jewish people and assaulting a police officer. title: Family escapes devastating Maddington house fire | 7NEWS
description: A mother and her three young children escaped a devastating house fire in Maddington by breaking through their neighbour's fence after flames engulfed their home within minutes. The family was treated for smoke inhalation at Armidale Hospital, while fire crews battled the suspicious blaze that started in the carport and destroyed the property. Police arson squad investigators are examining the cause of the fire, which occurred just two weeks before Christmas as the family was preparing to move out. title: Trump's new social media rules shock tourists | 7NEWS
description: The Trump administration has announced sweeping changes to tourism rules requiring travellers from visa-exempt countries including Australia, New Zealand and Britain to provide five years of social media history before entering the United States. Australia's landmarks including the Sydney Harbour Bridge and Melbourne's Flinders Street Station were illuminated in green and gold to mark the introduction of the world-leading social media ban for children under 16. Multiple breaking news stories include domestic violence charges, a fatal car crash in Liverpool, and High Country killer Greg Lynn awaiting the outcome of his appeal.
